doctors.name: Dr. MD. MAHBUBUL HAQUE
doctors.description: I love my job working with special needs children and adults who have communication & swallowing difficulties. I have completed my graduation in Speech & Language Therapy in 2013 and from then working in various fields of speech-language therapy and disability development sector.
